description:
Before taking this course students/professionals must answer a few questions which are as follows

1 . Are you sick of slow typing ?

2 . How will you feel once your average typing speed reaches 60+ with 100% accuracy ?

3 . Do you wish to sit ideal and watch other typing at higher speed ?

4 . Do you wish to become the FAVOURITE among other employee of your industry ?

5 . Do you want quick ladder climbing in your professional world ?

If you wish to achieve success against all odds then i strongly recommend you to take this course .

Well , let me inform you that this course is about the comprehensive techniques that a student / professional should have in order to master their typing skills .

After the completion of this coursework, students will be able to type at the minimum pace of 60+ wpm with 100% accuracy .

Students should look for "Typing" training on Udemy to reach this course . Beside this a promo video has been uploaded on YouTube so that students can feel the necessity to learn this course .

In this video everything related to Typing training has been included . Firstly, students have been taught the different the keys and posture . In the later section , students have been taught step wise technique that he or she should follow to achieve 60+ wpm speed with 100% accuracy .

This course will take a maximum of an hour and half .

Students should take this course to increase their productivity as the world is getting digital with every moving seconds . Learning fast typing will certainly give them the edge over the others . Let's go .
title: "Typing" training to achieve 60+ wpm with 100% accuracy
